bibl.title: The Charaktêres in Ancient and Medieval Jewish Magic.
bibl.note: Paper read at the international conference ""Charakter: An International Seminary on Magical Signs in Antiquity"" held on 24 September 2010 at the Department of Ancient History of ELTE University, Budapest. - A. Magical Signs in the Jewish Magical Tradition - A Typological Survey. - B. Magical Signs in the Jewish Magical Tradition - An Historical Survey. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Gideon Bohak, The Charaktêres in Ancient and Medieval Jewish Magic.

Paper read at the international conference ""Charakter: An International Seminary on Magical Signs in Antiquity"" held on 24 September 2010 at the Department of Ancient History of ELTE University, Budapest. - A.
